channel.title: Odds Of getting a useful Rune
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Odds Of getting a useful Rune"

item.title: Re: Odds Of getting a useful Rune
item.content:encoded: Somewhere between 85-95% of all ash covered runes you get will be worthless. This may be an exaggeration, but only a slight one.

item.title: Re: Odds Of getting a useful Rune
item.content:encoded: From what I've heard from others and experienced myself, worthless runes are far more common then non-worthless runes. I have seen examples of 20+ runes all appraised as worthless. So to answer the question - no you don't need a certain number or any other requirement.

item.title: Re: Odds Of getting a useful Rune
item.content:encoded: Seeing as the chances of getting each type of rune are the same from what I know,and there are 7 runes in total,including the worthless rune,that means you would have about a 14% chance of getting each one of the runes.If you only get worthless runes,that means you are extremely unlucky.

item.title: Re: Odds Of getting a useful Rune
item.content:encoded: It is the luck of the draw. You might draw 20 worthless out of 20, or you might get 20 mantis runes out of 20. Just keep getting those runes, farm them with larry+haro etc etc.

item.title: Odds Of getting a useful Rune
item.content:encoded: Ok I guess the question I'm asking is do you need a certain number of them or appraise them on certain days because did both and still got worthless.
